fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Light Punch: Visit a player. Gain 1 Combo if you're the only visitor. Attack them if you have 3+ Combo.
- [__MEGAVITAMINS__]: Requires 1 Combo. Throw a Megavitamin at a player tonight. Tomorrow night, it bounces off of them, randomly attacking one of their neighbors adjacent on the playerlist, skipping you. If it hits a player it doesn't kill, you will be informed, and the next night it continues bouncing to the next adjacent neighbor on the playerlist, and won't bounce to players it's already bounced on. You cannot use this ability if a Megavitamin is still bouncing. Gain 1 Combo each time you bounce a Megavitamin.
- [__SUPER SHEET__]: Requires 2 Combo. Give a player powerful defense tonight. If you protect them from an attack, gain 1 Combo.
- [__SUPER JUMP PUNCH__]: Requires 4 Combo. Attack a player. If they are attacked by something else tonight (including your Megavitamins), you rampage and gain 1 Combo.
- Overdrive (__DOCTOR FINALE__): Requires 5 Combo. Deal an Overkill attack to anyone.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill the other Fighter, then be the last one standing.
